abstract: Cloud computing is an emerging computing milieu which dynamically enables scalable and virtually unlimited resources. This panel will discuss emerging tools, skills and technologies that will ""seed the cloud"" - enabling improved interoperability, security, and economies of scale.

authors.name: Steven Fraser
authors.affiliation: Cisco Systems, San Jose, CA, USA

authors.name: Scott Jordan
authors.affiliation: PI (Physik Instrumente) L.P., San Jose, CA, USA

authors.name: Kate Keahey
authors.affiliation: Argonne National Lab , Chicago, IL, USA

title: Cloud computing beyond objects: seeding the cloud
